description: A midweight snow shell for everything from weekend resort laps to sled-accessed backcountry turns: the Cloud Bank™ features 2-layer GORE-TEX® shell fabric with completely recycled synthetic insulation, mapped to maximize warmth-to-weight while providing a full defense against wet spots. Enduring on even the toughest tracks and toasty on both sides of the mountain, this dialed feature set covers the full spectrum of ski days.
name: Mountain Hardwear Cloud Bank GTX Pants, Short - Mens
